settings.tab_content_para:
There is an amazing feeling you get when you buy a property and install your own power station. Supporting our customers to design and build their own power station is a very rewarding process for us as a business.

Understanding is the most powerful tool to have when deciding to live off-grid as you can save a lot of money & heartache with some knowledge.

We run our lives from batteries and have years of experience of the good times and the not so good times to share with you on your journey of going off-grid or installing a small battery bank to run dedicated circuits.

Our team are passionate about getting you the best system for your energy demands and once you talk to one of our team members you will know how passionate we are.
Our team are passionate about getting you the best system for your energy demands and once you talk to one of our team members you will know how passionate we are.

Save money. - Be more independent - Be blackout proof.
When you have a reliable grid the best battery you can use is the one you already have - your hot water system.

settings.about_desc:
Our team is passionate about designing and installing systems that meet and exceed our clients energy requirements. We offer a full service from concept, planning, installation and maintenance.

Our solutions provide proven results for our clients for powering their homes or meeting their sustainability and financial targets for business. We look forward to empowering you to take advantage of renewable energy.

settings.heading: Clean & Free Energy
settings.description: When you have a reliable grid the best battery you can use is the one you already have - your hot water system. Most hot water systems use 10-15kWs a day so diverting your excess solar to your hot water tank can be a better solution and something to consider. There are devices that can divert your excess solar to your hot water or it can be done with a simple timer. It would depend on your budget and what you want out of your system.

settings.benefit_desc:

settings.heading: The Off Grid Shop
settings.description:
Our team are passionate about getting you the best system for your energy demands and once you talk to one of our team members you will know how passionate we are.

We specialise in commercial, rural and off-grid solar systems and can supply and install Australia wide .We even do international projects.

We have installed solar on commercial businesses and off-grid homes within Australia with the focus on our community. We design advanced solar solutions that are technically & environmentally smart that will last.

settings.list_text: Offers which include cash back, bonus, bulk purchase, quantity limits or packages.
Pricing with included delivery or installation.
Offers not available to the general public - including trade, special event, club or membership offers.
Clearance, seconds, refurbished, ex-demonstration or display products.
Products shipped from or sold by third-party sellers on marketplace, auction or classifieds websites.
Products supplied through unauthorised distributors (known as ‘grey market’ items) or delivered directly to customers from an overseas distributor.
Products with pricing set significantly lower than the recommended retail price or market value.

settings.heading: Price Match
settings.p_desc: How do I request a Price Match?
settings.span_desc:
Simply present proof of the competitor’s advertised price for the identical product prior to your purchase to admin@theoffgridshop.com.au

Once your price match request is verified and the competitor’s product is confirmed as being in stock and available for immediate sale using the same payment method, we will happily match the price for you.

settings.list_text: Once payment has been cleared, we will contact you within 48 hours with shipping details.
If you have purchased a pre-wired item, call our shop prior to purchasing to discuss delivery times.
